title: Multilayer Ti3C2Tx MXene electrode decorated with polypyridine for efficient symmetric supercapacitors
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,4873-4881
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00892H, Paper
Peng Lin, Sibo Wang, Ailing Liu, Ting Yi, Fei Su, Hui Wang, Song Xue, Xueping Zong
A multilayer Ti3C2Tx MXene electrode decorated with polypyridine was employed to fabricate an efficient symmetric supercapacitor.
